verbs.description: [ARG0: Former FBI Director James Comey] [V: shot] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG1: at President Donald Trump 's claim the bureau engaged in ' spying ' on his campaign] – and Trump resumed his feud after a brief lull .
Former FBI Director James Comey shot back at President Donald Trump 's claim [ARG0: the bureau] [V: engaged] [ARG2: in ' spying ' on his campaign] – and Trump resumed his feud after a brief lull .

Former FBI Director James Comey shot back at President Donald Trump 's claim the bureau engaged in ' spying ' on his campaign – and [ARG0: Trump] [V: resumed] [ARG1: his feud] [ARGM-TMP: after a brief lull] .
